paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the investigation of TTR mutations in a cohort of Italian patients with undiagnosed axonal sensory-motor neuropathy, classified as CMT2. No TTR pathogenic variants were found in this cohort.

challenges: No TTR variants were reported in the study cohort.
extraction_metadata.notes: The study focused on screening for TTR mutations in a specific patient cohort but did not identify any TTR variants.
